Key.Original: The terrorists want to build a dirty bomb and successfully gained a barrel with radioactive material. Secret Service is on their track and have prepared the barrel with a GPS-Logger to find their hideout. Now German Forces are tasked to neutralize the threat.
Key.English: The terrorists want to build a dirty bomb and successfully gained a barrel with radioactive material. Secret Service is on their track and have prepared the barrel with a GPS-Logger to find their hideout. Now German Forces are tasked to neutralize the threat.
Key.German: Terroristen wollen eine schmutzige Bombe bauen und haben sich radioaktives Material beschafft. Der Geheimdienst ist ihnen aber auf der Spur und konnte das Behaeltnis mit einem GPS-Logger markieren, um ihren Unterschlupf ausfindig zu machen. Die Bundeswehr hat nun den Auftrag, die Gefahr zu neutralisieren.

Key.Original: In this mission OPFOR and later BLUFOR can choose their spawn point. BLUFOR has to spawn in a certain radius around the objective. Both side can choose a vehicle which they can spawn once. Furthermore OPFOR can build fortifications (Boss + Doc). Mission setup is triggered by the leaders on scrollwheel-menu.
Key.English: In this mission OPFOR and later BLUFOR can choose their spawn point. BLUFOR has to spawn in a certain radius around the objective. Both side can choose a vehicle which they can spawn once. Furthermore OPFOR can build fortifications (Boss + Doc). Mission setup is triggered by the leaders on scrollwheel-menu.
Key.German: In dieser Mission waehlen erst OPFOR, danach BLUFOR ihren beliebigen Startpunkt. BLUFOR hat einen Mindest-und einen Maximalabstand einzuhalten. Beide Seiten können jeweils ein Fahrzeug waehlen, das sie einnmalig spawnen lassen. OPFOR kann ausserdem Stellungen errichten (Leader + Medic). Das Missions-Setup wird von den jeweiligen Leadern im Mausradmenue ausgeführt.

Key.Original:
Hint for Spectator Cam
"L" to turn off crosshair
"Numpad" to activate Freelook
"Mousewheel" to switch alive units
"N" for Nightvision/Infrared
"Space" to toggle camera smoothing
Key.English:
Hint for Spectator Cam
"L" to turn off crosshair
"Numpad" to activate Freelook
"Mousewheel" to switch alive units
"N" for Nightvision/Infrared
"Space" to toggle camera smoothing
Key.German:
Hinweise zur Zuschauerkamera:
"L" um den Punkt abzuschalten
"*" Ziffernblock für volle Kamerakontrolle
"Mausrad" um lebende Einheiten durchzuschalten
"N" für Nightvision/Infrarot
"Leertaste" um die Kamerabeschleunigung zu aendern

Key.Original: Sorry, you joined too late. Spectate and enjoy!
Key.English: Sorry, you joined too late. Spectate and enjoy!
Key.German: Du bist zu spaet und musst zuschauen!

Key.Original: Sorry, Spawn too far away from objective
Key.English: Sorry, Spawn too far away from objective
Key.German: Sorry, Spawnpunkt zu weit weg vom Ziel

Key.Original: BLUFOR spawned. OPFOR may now spawn vehicle.
Key.English: BLUFOR spawned. OPFOR may now spawn vehicle.
Key.German: BLUFOR ist gespawned. OPFOR kann jetzt Fahrzeug spawnen.

Key.Original: OPFOR spawned. BLUFOR may spawn now.
Key.English: OPFOR spawned. BLUFOR may spawn now.
Key.German: OPFOR ist gespawned. BLUFOR kann jetzt spawnen.

Key.Original: You will now be teleported to Debriefing.
Key.English: You will now be teleported to Debriefing.
Key.German: Du wirst nun zum Debriefing teleportiert.

Key.Original: Right click exits cam. Start again with Mousewheel.
Key.English: Right click exits cam. Start again with Mousewheel.
Key.German: Rechtsklick beendet die Cam. Starte sie über Mausrad neu.
